## Next type

The `next` function that can be used to invoke next generic interceptor in the chain

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Next = () => ValueOrPromise<NonVoid>;
```
**References:** [ValueOrPromise](./context.valueorpromise.md)<!-- -->, [NonVoid](./context.nonvoid.md)
